radiographic_examinations.findings: Blurred T1 high signal in the hindlimb of the internal capsule, lack of white matter, and high T2 signal.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: At 6 months, brain MRI showed deep sulci, delayed myelination, little white matter, and thin corpus callosum.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Interictal multifocal epileptiform discharges, noticeable bilaterally in the occipital region.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: At 8 months, extensive, multifocal epileptic discharges between seizures. At 1 year and 2 months, slow background activity, no occipital-dominated rhythm, interictal multifocal epileptiform discharges. At 1 year and 6 months, displayed no occipital dominant rhythm, bilateral occipital spikes, and slow waves, with no seizures detected.
